nl.weeaboo.vn.image

Interface ITextureRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderable, IUpdateable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ITextureRenderer
extends IRenderable
    Renders a ITexture.

      • setUV

        void setUV(nl.weeaboo.common.Area2D uv)
        Changed the UV rectangle used for texture mapping. The UV-coordinates map to texture coordinate space, which uses a normalized range from 0 to 1.
